components.description:
The buttery-white snack of popcorn brimming in a classic red-and-white-striped carton, as enjoyed at a movie theater. 

May be used to express engagement (“edge of one’s seat”).
components.title: Popcorn

description:
The buttery-white snack of popcorn brimming in a classic red-and-white-striped carton, as enjoyed at a movie theater. 

May be used to express engagement (“edge of one’s seat”).
title: Popcorn

version.description: The Unicode Consortium has approved the following 41 emoji characters as part of Unicode 8.0, released on June 17, 2015. This is comprised of 37 new emojis, plus five emoji modifiers. Find out more about this update on the Emojipedia Blog.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Beverage and food symbols
emoji_net_data.definition: Popcorn, a snack often eaten at the cinema. Sometimes referred to as popping corn. Popcorn was approved as part of Unicode 8.0 in 2015 and a http://emojipedia.org/popcorn/
emoji_net_data.name: popcorn

bn:00091091v: To eat a snack or light meal.
To eat small things in between meals.

bn:00063565n: Corn having small ears and kernels that burst when exposed to dry heat
A snack food made from corn kernels popped by dry heating.
Popcorn, also known as popping corn, is a type of corn that expands from the kernel and puffs up when heated.

bn:00010746n: The term "collation" originates in the Roman Catholic Church, where it refers to the two small meals allowed on days of fasting, with or without abstinence.

bn:00035650n: Any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body. For prepared ready-to-eat food, use dish: Q746549.
Any substance consumed by living organisms to sustain life.
Any substance that can be consumed by living organisms, especially by eating, in order to sustain life.
Any solid substance (as opposed to liquid) that is used as a source of nourishment
Food is any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body.

apple_vendor_description: This delightful popcorn emoji on Apple devices bursts with a warm, buttery yellow hue, each piece rendered with a plump, inviting texture and subtle 3D shading that suggests a satisfying crunch. The soft rounded edges of the kernels and the overall glossy finish evoke the joy of a shared cinematic experience, a hallmark of Apple's visual style. It's a perfect symbol for movie nights, entertainment, or anticipating something fun and exciting in messages.
